Key Match Events: South Africa lost their top 4 batters inside the powerplay for just 23 runs
Tanzim Sakib picked up 3 wickets for just 13 runs in his initial 3-over spell
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Aiden Markram said they would bat first due to the used wicket and the difficulty in chasing on this surface
Markram added that the team needed to find some form, and the head space was right, hopefully a matter of time
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York pitch has felt considerably difficult for the opening batters, with players looking to survive the first 8-10 overs and then post a decent total
Others: South Africa played in the same pitch as the one in India vs Pakistan, where India were bowled out for 119 runs, which Pakistan failed to chase down
